snippet: French open runner-up Andy Murray should consider re-hiring Ivan Lendl as his coach ahead of Wimbledon, according to American seven-times grand slam champion John McEnroe....
lead_paragraph: French open runner-up Andy Murray should consider re-hiring Ivan Lendl as his coach ahead of Wimbledon, according to American seven-times grand slam champion John McEnroe.

headline.print_headline: Murray Should Consider Reunion With Lendl, Says McEnroe
headline.main: Murray Should Consider Reunion With Lendl, Says McEnroe
